summary: I am a highly decisive and cooperative Certified Public Accountant with 20 years’ experience in multinational corporations across a variety of departments. I possess excellent communication skill coupled with strong people management qualities. I am known as an “out of the box” leader and strategic thinker, high performing in exceeding expectations within set time frames. I am diligent, a high performance team developer, adaptable and flexible in going beyond boundaries to achieve professional excellence.

profile_positions.description:
I joined JDE’s Internal Audit department, reporting to Global Internal Audit Director. I am responsible for implementing data analytics in internal audit, performing audits and business product owner for Global Audit Analytics.

Highlights:
。Pathfinder within JDE in data analytics; implemented the use of data analytics in internal audit activities
。100% successful recovery of duplicated payments made to suppliers totalling > €200k with the implementation of data analytics. In-house potential duplicated payments review replaced the initial proposal of outsourcing to a commission based agency
。Designed and built global export sales flows report, allowing central monitoring to ensure compliance with JDE business model and tax agreement
。Introduced the use of data analytics to other departments such as central master data, procurement and global transactional finance, reducing workload and improved efficiency
。Laid down the future data analytics landscape focusing on automation and standardisation
。Developing standard reports to support internal control framework
。Help to drive continuous improvements to systems, ways of working and process efficiency through data analytics
。Built financial ratios and trend analysis to support audit activities
。Reduced consultancy cost since taking over a major part of SAP GRC maintenance from external consultant, savings in SAP GRC license fee through data cleansing, and successful setup of letter of representation structure, regulatory, business model and internal control frameworks followed by 2 major upgrades in SAP GRC
。Built JDE combined business model training website and compliance repositories in Sharepoint
profile_positions.title: Data Analytics in Internal Audit

profile_positions.description:
Began almost a decade ago as Malaysia Accounts Receivable Team Lead and rose to the position of Planning and Appraisal Manager for Global Credit with direct reports across the globe (USA, Canada, Philippines, Thailand and Czech Republic) and oversee Finance Operations Credit MI team in Philippines. I am accountable for planning & analysis, cost control, Credit management authority on accounting principles (ensure alignment with Shell Group consolidation requirement), management information (MI) reporting and support of global initiatives. I ensured MI design meet current and future requirements.

Highlights:
。 MI Design Owner with commercially valuable analytical skills and insight; hands-on with ERP systems/data models and able to guide IT architects accordingly
。 Contributed to exceptional Credit outperformance of targets (an extra $200 mln of working capital reduction)
。 Initiated global dispute process review that was nominated for EVP award with > $100 mln working capital reduction
。 Developed Credit Information & Insights Dashboard (a suite of highly visual and interactive dashboard)
。 Refined A/R return (yield) metric and portfolio analysis across regions/businesses
。 Improved and robust budget (cost + FTE), forecast, planning & appraisal process and metrics reporting
。 Further standardisation and consolidation of reports
。 Involved in game changer business integrations, portfolio changes, migration of activities, business value added propositions and increased automation of systems/processes; managing stakeholders at all levels in the organisation
。 Creation of cost efficiency improvements
profile_positions.title: Planning and Appraisal Manager

profile_positions.description:
Based in the Netherlands whilst overseeing Finance Operations Credit MI team in Philippines, I was responsible for planning and appraisal, reporting, portfolio analysis, target setting, operational costs and FTE planning and monitoring for East region and various Shell businesses; managing stakeholders across regions and with various disciplines. I provided Credit strategy support, involved in projects and change management. I reviewed process/system change requests for MI impact and monitored debt recovery. I was Credit MI trainer and Subject Matter Expert.

Highlights:
。 Instrumental in development of Global Performance Management Reporting (GPMR) system
。 Standardised and consolidated global reporting in GPMR and Business Warehouse + managed reporting requirements in line with organisational changes with improved reporting quality and timelines
。 Portfolio analysis for East region and in depth business analysis
。 Advance knowledge in systems/IT applications e.g. GPMR, SAP R/3, SAP Business Warehouse, Business Intelligence, credit assessment tool (DebiTEX), Microsoft AX and GFN
。 Spearheaded Global initiative in standardisation of collaterals monitoring through a master database of financial institutions and system postings
。 Involved in deployment of credit assessment tool (DebiTEX + report design), Retail Fleet Card new system implementation and global SAP rollout including business impact analysis
。 Successfully led migration of activities to Finance Operations focusing on One Team delivery 
。 Rolled out Ways of Working between onshore and Finance Operations
。 Drove ESSA with focus on eliminating non-value added activities
profile_positions.title: Regional Operations Analyst - East

profile_positions.description:
Report to South East Asia Cluster Credit Manager, Malaysia Accounts Receivable & Credit Super User and Singapore Credit Super User. Came into position when Credit Organisation was newly setup, instrumental in putting in place robust MI reporting, continuously improved Credit processes and key player in Global SAP/streamline process implementation in Singapore.

Highlights:
。 Developed timely and standardised Credit performance reports (recognition award given by Lubricants business) 
。 Improved target setting process for Sales teams
。 Co-author for Accountability vs Profitability views discussion paper
。 Contributed to the development of Credit MI definitions
。 Worked with designer/architect to improve reports in Business Warehouse
。 Improved transfer of debts to legal department process and monitored status of debt recovery
。 Improved provision for bad debts review with forecasts
。 Refined SOX controls and worked with Governance Risk Assurance Manager in liaising with auditors
。 Ensured compliance with Credit Manual and Manual of Authority
。 Supported business integrations, migrations of activities and established Credit Archetype (role mapping focal) 
。 Analysed streamline design viability, raised change requests for process/system improvements, assessed retrofit impacts, co-ordinated and performed system testings/data validations
。 Provided training for Credit, AR and MI processes and localised work instructions
profile_positions.title: MI and Process Analyst - South East Asia

profile_positions.description:
Based in Finance Operations located in Malaysia, I led a team of 7 direct reports and was accountable for day-to-day Accounts Receivables activities such as cash application and allocation, monitoring of debt and follow up on non-payment, preparation of provision for bad debts, preparation of operational MI (e.g. KPIs, aging reports, metrics), business continuity planning, system Super User, safe keeping of collaterals and expiration monitoring, stakeholder management and development of direct reports.

Highlights:
。 Subject Matter Expert in Global SAP/streamline process implementation, Global SAP Focal and Business Analyst for Accounts Receivables with key contributions leading to a successful go-live in pathfinder country
。 Analysed streamline design and process viability; highlighted areas for improvement
。 Planned and executed Accounts Receivable activities and cutover strategy during system change over
。 Localised training materials and prepared work instructions
。 Global SAP trainer for Accounts Receivable module
。 Performed system testings and data validations
。 Role mapping focal
。 Involved in business portfolio changes
profile_positions.title: Malaysia Accounts Receivable Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
I led a team of 7 direct reports, report to Finance General Manager, a member of Technical Services Committee, Tender Committee and Crisis Committee representing Finance. I was accountable for Capital Expenditure and Infrastructure projects, Fixed Asset, Accounts Payable (day to day activities included but not limited to invoice review and approval, contract negotiations), Operational Expenditure, budgeting, reporting (MI and statutory reports) and forecasts, review of contracts prepared by legal and external parties before Directors’/Finance GM’s approval, review of payroll deductions, liaising with auditors and tax computations.

Highlights:
。 Set up comprehensive Capex budgeting and monitoring process with frequent engagements with department heads 
。 Represented Finance during negotiations with contractors/suppliers
。 Conducted site visits on on-going projects, monitored bidding activities, leases and project retention sums.
。 Ensured Westport's status as Best Paymaster
。 Implemented E-Payment (as part of Port Improvement Project)
。 Improved monitoring of operational expenditure, insurance portfolio and claims.
。 Timely forecast and business performance reports submission to Hutchison Whampoa Ltd 
。 Improved co-ordination of statutory audit
profile_positions.title: Finance Executive

profile_positions.description: I was offered letter of employment 1 semester before completion of Degree and was Senior in charged for subsidiaries of listed companies with local and foreign operations in various industries (retail, chemicals, trading, marketing, transportation, logistics, manufacturing, industrial and automotive). I have experience in Malaysia corporate tax (Malaysia listed companies and SMEs), strong analytical and reconciliation skills, and technical knowledge in Financial Accounting. I also trained new recruits.
profile_positions.title: Auditor
